about_the_game:
Play as Pikkon from the movie "Dragon Ball Z: Fusion Reborn", and Toppo (God of Destruction) from DRAGON BALL Super in Legendary Pack 1.
In addition, there are new extra missions featuring Fu, Parallel Quests, New Skills, New Costumes and New Illustrations that will allow you to enjoy DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 even more!

• 2 New characters: Pikkon, Toppo (God of Destruction)
• 2 New Extra Missions
• 4 New Parallel Quests
• 6 Additional Moves
• 3 Costumes/Accessories
• 5 Super Souls
• 15 Illustrations

* Some of the above content can be obtained by meeting certain conditions in the game.
